projects.name: Lighthouse
projects.description: A website to lookup player statistics for the MCC Island Minecraft network. See your game stats, badges, currency, socials, online status and more! Currently under development with new features being added all the time!

projects.name: Lighthouse Bot
projects.description: A Discord bot to view information about the MCC event including results from past events, the current teams and stats from the Hall of Fame. Invite the bot to your server from the website!

projects.name: Centurion
projects.description: An RPG-style Discord bot for a community server, featuring custom built currency, inventory, shops, and items. This was developed for a community server owned by a friend and influencer.

projects.name: Hypixel Housing
projects.description: A group of Hypixel housings built by myself and a friend, featuring a variety of games and themes. We built these housings using Hypixel's custom housing tools and our knowledge of game design concepts.

projects.name: Pushback
projects.description: A Roblox duelling game, built by myself and a business partner, in which players battle to push each other off an arena. It features custom built maps, weapon skins, shops and crates and leaderboards.

projects.name: PocketGames
projects.description: A Minecraft plugin which adds several minigames to your server, including classics like Rock Paper Scissors and Tic Tac Toe as well as originals such as Fish Match! Features multiplayer modes as well as an in-built database to store player stats and leaderboards.

projects.name: Blair's Brainiacs
projects.description: Formed over lockdown, Blair's Brainiacs became the largest study community in the UK! I helped administrate the server, as well as developed several bots to handle moderation, an economy and custom minigames.

projects.name: Discord Bot Template
projects.description: A GitHub template to easily create a Discord bot quickly, built in JavaScript & Node.js with Discord.js v14. It includes a custom built slash command handler, event listeners, and support for environment variables.

experience.name: MCC Game Tester
experience.description: I help to test the MC Championship event and the MCC Island Minecraft server, providing feedback and bug reports to the developers.

experience.name: MCC Moderator
experience.description: I am a volunteer moderator for MCC Island, a public Minecraft server based on the MC Championship event. I help keep the server & Discord community a fun and friendly place!
